attribute.description: Define the format of file export. Available formats: "xls","pdf","csv", "xml".
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Define the id of the ace:dataTable whose data will be exported.
attribute.name: target

attribute.description: Enable to export only the currently selected rows instead of the whole dataset.
attribute.name: selectedRowsOnly

attribute.description: Return true if this component (and its children) should be rendered during the Render Response phase of the request processing lifecycle.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: Disable whether column footers should be included at the bottom of the file. This is not applicable when attribute 'type' is set to 'xml'.
attribute.name: includeFooters

attribute.description: The component identifier for this component. This value must be unique within the closest parent component that is a naming container.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Define a character encoding to use.
attribute.name: encoding

attribute.description: Custom CSS style class(es) to use for this component. These style classes can be defined in your page or in a theme CSS file.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Define the filename of the generated file, defaults to dataTable id.
attribute.name: fileName

attribute.description: Enable to export only the current page instead of the whole data set.
attribute.name: pageOnly

attribute.description: Disable whether column headers should be included at the top of the file. This is not applicable when attribute 'type' is set to 'xml'.
attribute.name: includeHeaders

attribute.description: Define the text that will appear on the button to trigger the export. Default value is 'Export'. Attribute applies only if the component has no children.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Defines a public void method to invoke after the PDF or XLS document has been be populated. It must take an Object argument. The object will be of type com.lowagie.text.Document for PDF documents and of type org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook for XLS documents.
attribute.name: postProcessor

attribute.description: Defines a public void method to invoke before the PDF or XLS document starts to be populated. It must take an Object argument. The object will be of type com.lowagie.text.Document for PDF documents and of type org.apache.poi.ss.usermodel.Workbook for XLS documents.
attribute.name: preProcessor

attribute.description: Custom inline CSS styles to use for this component. These styles are generally applied to the root DOM element of the component. This is intended for per-component basic style customizations. Note that due to browser CSS precedence rules, CSS rendered on a DOM element will take precedence over the external stylesheets used to provide the ThemeRoller theme on this component. If the CSS properties applied with this attribute do not affect the DOM element you want to style, you may need to create a custom theme styleClass for the theme CSS class that targets the particular DOM elements you wish to customize.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Using an EL expression, bind the component reference to a bean property, so that the component may be accessed in the bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Define a comma separated list of column indexes (zero-relative) to be excluded from export.
attribute.name: excludeColumns
